name: Paint it Back Demo
description:
Welcome to the end. The world is dead, abandoned, lifeless. Colorless.

Embark on a bittersweet journey, look for clues, memories of the old world to discover what happened to… us. To find the answers, you will have to look into yourself. Deep.

Your guide and only friend on the road will be a sarcastic AI, Origo. Who needs enemies with friends you have?

Paint it Back merges exploration, flying, dialogue-heavy storytelling, puzzles, and mini-games. Development is still ongoing; the full version will be available soon.

Explore one of the first areas of the game in this short (about 15 minutes) demo. Available in English and Japanese.

Your feedback is much appreciated. Thank you for playing.
